content.text:
# 32nd Actors and Actresses Union Awards

| site = Circo Price, Madrid, Spain
| host = Arantxa Aranguren, Stephanie Gil, and Juan Messeguer
| organizer = Actors and Actresses Union
| last = 31st
| next = 33rd
| free_award_type = Honorary career award
| free_award = Gemma Cuervo
}}
The 32nd Actors and Actresses Union Awards ceremony was held on 11 March 2024 at the Circo Price in Madrid. It was hosted by , , and .
In addition to the competitive awards, "the actresses who changed the language of cinema in Spain" were recognised with the  award, whilst Gemma Cuervo  was bestowed the  life achievement career award and SAG-AFTRA}} received the special award "for its work in defending the rights of the artistic community, its negotiating skills and its resilience at a key moment for all audiovisual professionals".
